description:
Heading into changeable conditions in cold weather? Throw on this techy fleece hoody at the trailhead and keep it on all day, whether you're slogging up the steep bits or taking a break. A DWR finish adds wind and water resistance to the abrasion-resistant outer face fabric. Inside, high-loft fleece traps warmth, but still expels moisture. The articulated pattern and raglan sleeves let you twist and stretch while mountaineering, scrambling or hiking.

  • Made of recycled polyester and spandex stretch double-weave fabric that adds warmth but breathes well to avoid overheating
  • Durable face is wind- and water-resistant thanks to a DWR finish
  • Articulated pattern with raglan sleeves promotes range of motion
  • Hood with partial elastic binding fits comfortably under a helmet
  • Handwarmer pockets are set high above a harness or hipbelt
  • 2 interior drop-in mesh pockets hold gloves or snacks
  • Stretch-knit low-profile cuffs resist snagging
  • Partial binding on hem seals in warmth
name: Patagonia R2 TechFace Hoody - Men's
